Description: We are looking for an experienced Dermatologist to join our specialized team. Must be capable of diagnosing skin problems, from mild ones (e.g. sunburn) to severe ones (e.g. skin cancer). Ensure to conduct screenings and skin evaluations, and analyze the patient’s medical history to determine appropriate treatments. To oversee how effective the treatments are and refer patients to different specialists if needed.  Duties and responsibilities●      Evaluate patient’s skin condition●      Assess and update patient’s medical history●      Keep a record of the patient’s symptoms●      Analyze all information regarding skin health conditions●      Prescribe medication●      Inform patients about available treatments●      Monitor the effectiveness of skin treatments ●      Conduct non-intrusive medical surgeries●      Educate patients on preventive skincare●      Refer patients to other specialists if needed●      Attend conferences and seminars to learn about new medical techniques and topics.Skills
Skills: ●      In-depth knowledge of various dermatological methods
●      Active communication skills and the ability to effectively explain medical terms to patients
